infos.value: ...And just where have you been, dear village leader?
...Mariale.
I have been on the battlefield.
I had not joined the fight once since it began...
I must say...I am impressed that someone like you became the chief of Gouga.
I want the fighting to stop... The elder feels the same way, which is why Iâ€”
Enough of your nonsense!
What...?
You have wanted for nothing being the elder's only daughter!
But the rest of us are different.
If there was no more fighting, what do you think would become of us?
This land is barren and cannot yield crops.
How do you expect to feed people in these conditions?
Well, I...
Without war, we lose our livelihood.
And I am sick of living in a dark and damp cave.
You don't need to worry about that.
You are...?
Zazan. Zazan the Unkillable.
A wanderer. He has promise, so I brought him into Gouga.
Wait a moment.
I am the village chief. Why did you not discuss it with me first?
Then allow me to ask now.
Do you have a problem with allowing Zazan into our village?
We know nothing of this man. There is no telling what will happen if we allow him into Gouga.
This man has brought some...interesting information with him.
What do you mean...?
I heard a rumor that Saiga's chief Skahal has been meeting with someone from Gouga in secret.
What...?
Intriguing, isn't it?
B-but...it is simply a rumor. It could be false...
It could be.
But Zazan's background is certain. After all, Rairyuu was the one who sent him here.
Just leave it to me.
I'm a harder worker than you think! Ha ha ha ha ha!
Wh-what is it?
You smell of blood.
I do?
Your clothes reek of it.
You look harmless, but you've got the blood of at least seven men on you.
So the rumors of Gouga really are true!
Well, I'm ready to get to work.
I have the perfect mission for you.
And that is...?
I just heard back from one of our scouts.
The chief of Saiga is heavily wounded and making his escape as we speak.
Hunting down the chief of Saiga, huh. A fine prey!
Consider his head as good as gone. That ought to win you this battle.
I'm off.
...In the meantime, why not find something a little more chiefly to do?
What should I do...? At this rate, Skahal will...
...I need to stop him.
